messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 1141
messages.msgSnippet: Now that I m totally grossed out I had to look it up. 1. a nearly transparent,glutinous substance, obtained by boiling the bones and ligaments, etc., of
messages.messageBody:
Now that I'm totally grossed out I had to look it up. 1. a nearly
transparent,glutinous substance, obtained by boiling the bones and
ligaments, etc., of animals...eeeewwwww! Candied Yams too. At least those I
make myself with out that stuff.
Thanks Tia I've learned a lot today in all different kinds of things.
<g>


Barb E
"The fact that you are willing to say, "I do not
understand, and it is fine," is the greatest understanding
you could exhibit."

- Wayne Dyer, Author and Speaker

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 1141
messages.msgSnippet: Tia, Thanks I had no idea. I bet there are lots more stuff with gelatin in it I wasn t aware of. Now Jello doesn t sound so good either. ;-) LOL! Barb E If
messages.messageBody:
Tia,
Thanks I had no idea. I bet there are lots more stuff with gelatin in it
I wasn't aware of. Now Jello doesn't sound so good either. ;-) LOL!


Barb E

"If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not
a tree. You have the ability to totally transform every
area in your life - and it all begins with your very own
power of choice."

- Jim Rohn, Author and speaker

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 1141
messages.msgSnippet: Opps! So sorry I shouldn t have been so flippant. :-( I m sure it is fun. Vegetarian marshmalows? I thought marshmallows were made of nothing but sugar. Is it
messages.messageBody:
Opps! So sorry I shouldn't have been so flippant. :-( I'm sure it is
fun.
Vegetarian marshmalows? I thought marshmallows were made of nothing but
sugar. Is it the food coloring or corn starch? Made me curious so I looked.


Barb E
"By learning to be with myself, to bring peace to myself,
I can be more effective both in creating happiness in my
own life and in offering a helping hand to others."

- Ingrid Bacci, Author

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 1141
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/19/2004 4:39:35 PM Eastern Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes: That sounds good & yummy. Who needs a S more maker.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/19/2004 4:39:35 PM Eastern Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
That sounds good & yummy. Who needs a S'more maker. Really some of the
thing people buy. LOL!
************************
Well...we bought one for my son for Christmas, and it's a blast. Very fun and
festive.
We got it when I discovered that a couple places started making vegetarian
marshmallows again. Julian hadn't had a S'more for years and years.

Kathryn
